question: 生保
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>Life</kanji> <kanji>guarantee</kanji> is something you get on someone else. If their life ends, it's guaranteed with money. That's a <vocabulary>life insurance</vocabulary> policy, for yah! (A.K.A. <vocabulary>life assurance</vocabulary> in some parts of the world!)
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
